description: [``botocore``] Adding waiter support for deployments and environments; documentation updates

[``botocore``] This release adds the following fields to DescribeContact: DisconnectReason, AgentInitiatedHoldDuration, AfterContactWorkStartTimestamp, AfterContactWorkEndTimestamp, AfterContactWorkDuration, StateTransitions, Recordings, ContactDetails, ContactEvaluations, Attributes
[``botocore``] Feature - Adding support for Scheduled and Rolling Update Software in Sagemaker Hyperpod.
[``botocore``] Amazon Verified Permissions / Features : Adds support for tagging policy stores.
